name: Coeur D'Alene Seaplanes
about: Coeur d'Alene Seaplanes offers a unique and comprehensive flying experience, specializing in seaplane training. Located less than an hour from Spokane International Airport, our school provides a real back-country seaplane flying experience. Our standard course includes 7 hours of flight time in the Cubcrafters XCub Amphib, along with unlimited ground instruction. Advanced courses cover confined area and river current techniques. Our instructors, including Kevin Heiss and Glenn Smith, bring extensive experience in various flying disciplines, with over 20,000 combined hours of flight time. We offer lodging and entertainment package deals and ensure a safe and engaging training environment. Join us for an unparalleled seaplane training experience in the beautiful scenery of North Idaho.
